yield.from sentence: From the results , we observe that the concatenation would yield an improvement , verifying that integrating contextual semantics would be quite useful for language understanding .

SemBERT.from sentence: However , SemBERT still outperforms the simple BERT + SRL model just like the latter outperforms the original BERT by a large performance margin , which shows that SemBERT works more effectively for integrating both plain contextual representation and contextual semantics at the same time .
